mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL ( DOLLNAME, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, GUESS_ID, GOLD, STOP_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{DOLLNAME}, #{NICKNAME}, now(), #{GUESS_ID}, #{GOLD}, #{STOP_FLAG} )
